fields.environment:
OS: Ubuntu Server 14.04 64bit
JDK: Java 7.0.67 64 bit
Maven: apache-maven-3.2.3-bin.tar.gz
Ant: apache-ant-1.9.4-bin.tar.gz

$ sudo apt-get install autoconf automake libtool cmake
$ sudo apt-get install openssl
$ sudo apt-get install libssl-dev
$ sudo apt-get install libncurses5-dev
$ sudo apt-get install gcc*
$ sudo apt-get install build-essential
$ sudo apt-get install g++
$ sudo apt-get install pkg-config

$ tar zxvf protobuf-2.5.0.tar.gz

$ cd protobuf-2.5.0
$ sudo ./configure 
$ sudo make 
$ sudo make check 
$ sudo make install 

$ cd hadoop-2.5.0-src
$ mvn package -Pdist,native -DskipTests -Dtar -e

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open
